task: The function $ g $ is defined by $ g(x) = 2x - 1 $. What is the value of $ g(x) $ when $ x = 7 $?
explanation:
Choice B is correct. The value of $ g(x) $ when $ x = 7 $ can be found by substituting 7 for $ x $ in the given equation $ g(x) = 2x - 1 $. 
This yields $ g(7) = 2(7) + -1 $, or $ g(7) = 13 $. Therefore, when $ x = 7 $, the value of $ g(x) $ is $ 13 $.
